name: 15 Rings
description:
I'm proud to present my 15th published app: 15 Rings, a delicious game in which you have to cross 15 rotating rings in one combo. Just tap the screen to jump ahead and be careful to not collide with rings or you'll have to restart the level, but don't be too cautious because if you run out of time your combo will be interrupted and you'll lose.

Reasons why you'll love this game?
•Combo everywhere!
•Good visuals! Very pleasant to your eyes!
•Just 15 rings to cross allow you to play in quick sessions (on the train? Waiting in queue?)
•You can buy a crown!!!

You will compete in the global leaderboard with other players from all the world and prove that you are the best at 15 Rings! Can you beat the JindoBlu record? Challenge the combo in 15 Rings, a juicy game for your stress relief!
